title: Remove leading or trailing characters
sql:
with rws as (
  select '##string##' str from dual
)
  select ltrim ( str, '#' ) left_removed, 
         rtrim ( str, '#' ) right_removed, 
         trim ( leading '#' from str ) start_removed,
         trim ( trailing '#' from str ) end_removed,
         trim ( both '#' from str ) both_removed
  from   rws;
  
LEFT_REMOVED  RIGHT_REMOVED  START_REMOVED  END_REMOVED  BOTH_REMOVED    
string##      ##string       string##       ##string     string
